title: Skin got in crafting not available
body: So I decided to reroll 3 skin shards in order to get one skin permament, which got me Challenger Ahri skin. But the skin is not available and I cant even see it on the profile, which doesnt make sense cuz im 100% sure i owned it after i rolled 3 different skin shards. I never screenshot when i purchase something so i dont have an actual proof, but im hoping Riot can somehow check my profile and find out. I was dissapointed when I figured out the skin is not there, since we all know key fragments doesnt drop very often, and it takes time to get 3 skins from chests. I just want my challenger ahri back :/

replies.body: This does sound like a strange situation, so I took a look into this for you to find out what's going on.  It looks like you did receive Challenger Ahri as a shard around the 13th.  About a few minutes after that, you included it as part of a reroll to obtain the Longhorn Alistar Skin along with 100 Orange essences.  unfortunately, it does seem that the shard was used.  I hope that helps clear things up and that you are able to obtain her again!
